     <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-12">
       Examples: student, word, djak, re"c, comput# for all words starting with comput.
      </div>

     <!--results-->
     A majority of the terms are stored in singular, musculine, and the base verb form.
Use table instead of tables, work instead of worked.

     <h6>
      <!--begin_descr-->
      Online since 1999, this Serbian-English Dictionary is described as "Most extensive online dictionary" of Serbian,
Laughborough University, UK.
      <a href="http://www.restore.ac.uk/lboro/resources/analysis/linguistic.php" style="color:#34495e;" tabindex="10">
       see more...
      </a>
     </h6>
     The dictionary is used to translate from English to Serbian and to translate from Serbian to English.
